TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmpBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class WmpBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码 Microsoft Windows Media 照片图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Microsoft Windows Media Photo images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是一种新的编解码器，提供的图像保真度比具有较小文件大小和功能的 JPEG 更好。is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像使用单个算法实现了有损和无损压缩。images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支持现有的元数据标准。images support existing metadata standards. 有关此格式的其他信息，请参阅[Windows Media 照片规范](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。For additional information about this format, see [Windows Media Photo Specification](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx). [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 文件不支持预览、全局缩略图、框架级缩略图或多个帧。files do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, or multiple frames. 编码在部分信任环境中不起作用。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 有关部分信任的信息，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security)。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) for information on partial trust.

span.span: Windows Media Photo Specification

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化 以对新的位图图像进行编码。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/WDPEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/WDPEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/WDPEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte AlphaDataDiscardLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.AlphaDataDiscardLevel : byte with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在压缩域编码转换过程中要丢弃的 alpha 频率数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of alpha frequency data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.

value.span: 对图像进行编码时要丢弃的 alpha 数据级别。

span.span: The level of alpha data to discard when encoding the image.

value.span: 值范围从 0（无数据丢弃）到 4（alpha 通道完全丢弃）。

span.span: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 4 (alpha channel completely discarded).
The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 说明

span.span: Description

description.span: 无图像频率数据丢弃。

span.span: No image frequency data is discarded.

description.span: 将丢弃 FlexBits。

span.span: FlexBits are discarded.

description.span: 图像的图像质量降低，但不会改变图像的有效分辨率。

span.span: The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.

description.span: 将丢弃 HighPass 频率数据带。

span.span: HighPass frequency data band is discarded.

description.span: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的四分之一。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.

description.span: 将丢弃 HighPass 和 LowPass 频率数据带。

span.span: HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.

description.span: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的十六分之一。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.

description.span: Alpha 通道完全丢弃。

span.span: The alpha channel is completely discarded.

description.span: 像素格式将更改，以反映 alpha 通道的移除。

span.span: The pixel format is changed to reflect the removal of the alpha channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 设置为 `true` 并且图像包含平面或交错 alpha 通道时，此属性才有效;否则，将忽略它。This property has an effect only if is set to `true` and the image contains either a planar or interleaved alpha channel; otherwise, it is ignored.

exception.span: 给定值不在 0 和 4 之间。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 4.

member this.AlphaQualityLevel : byte with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 为平面 alpha 通道获取或设置压缩质量。

span.span: Gets or sets the compression quality for a planar alpha channel.

value.span: 平面 alpha 通道图像的压缩质量。

span.span: The compression quality for a planar alpha channel image.

value.span: 如果值为 1，则视为无损压缩；值越大，则压缩比越高，图像质量越低。

span.span: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and increasing values result in higher compression ratios and lower image quality.
The value range is 1 to 255.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 `false` 时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only if is `false`.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置压缩编码过程中要使用的水平分割数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.

summary.span: 一次分割将创建两个水平区域。

span.span: A single division creates two horizontal regions.

value.span: 压缩编码过程中要使用的水平分割数。

span.span: The number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.
The value range is 0 to 4095.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`，则 必须设置为0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 由部门创建的磁贴绝不能小于16像素。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 调整该值以保持最小磁贴大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 与 结合使用时，平铺的网格将形成。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果两个属性都设置为1，则将图像分成4个图块。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.

The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 说明

span.span: Description

description.span: 无图像频率数据丢弃。

description.span: 将丢弃 HighPass 和 LowPass 频率数据带。

span.span: HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.

description.span: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的十六分之一。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效;否则，将忽略它。This property has an effect only if is set to `true`; otherwise, it is ignored.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置重叠处理级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the overlap processing level.
The overlap processing level.
The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 说明

span.span: Description

description.span: 未启用重叠处理。

span.span: No overlap processing is enabled.

description.span: 启用重叠处理的一个级别。

span.span: One level of overlap processing is enabled.

description.span: 将根据相邻块的值对 4x4 块的编码值进行修改。

span.span: Encoded values of 4x4 blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring blocks.

description.span: 启用重叠处理的两个级别。

span.span: Two levels of overlap processing are enabled.

description.span: 除第一级处理外，还将根据相邻宏块的值对 16x16 宏块的编码值进行修改。

span.span: In addition to the first level of processing, encoded values of 16x16 macro blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring macro blocks.

The compression quality for the main image.

value.span: 如果值为 1，则视为无损压缩；值越大，则压缩比越高，图像质量越低。

span.span: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and higher values indicate a high compression ratio and lower image quality.
The range is 1 to 255.
The default is 1.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 RGB 图像编码的子采样级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.

value.span: RGB 图像编码的子采样级别。

span.span: The sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.
The range is 0 to 3.
The default is 3.
Value

description.span: 说明

span.span: Description
4:0:0 encoding.

description.span: 丢弃色度内容，保留亮度。

span.span: Chroma content is discarded; luminance is preserved.
4:2:0 encoding.

description.span: 将色度分辨率减少为亮度分辨率的 1/4。

span.span: Chroma resolution is reduced by 1/4 of luminance resolution.
4:2:2 encoding.

description.span: 将色度分辨率减少到亮度分辨率的 1/2。

span.span: Chroma resolution is reduced to 1/2 of luminance resolution.
4:4:4 encoding.

description.span: 保留色度分辨率。

span.span: Chroma resolution is preserved.

exception.span: 给定值不在 0 和 3 之间。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 3.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`，则 必须设置为0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 由部门创建的磁贴绝不能小于16像素。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 调整该值以保持最小磁贴大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 与 结合使用时，平铺的网格将形成。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果两个属性都设置为1，则将图像分成4个图块。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.
